Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the flow name. For example:

{ "Ref": "myFlowArn" }

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow.
